header.title: Education
header.subtitle: My academic journey has been a continuous pursuit of knowledge and a foundation for my professional growth, blending business acumen with practical, real-world applications.

points: Graduated with honors, focusing on strategic planning and marketing strategy.
Completed a Minor in Marketing, developing a strong foundation in consumer behavior and market analysis.
Thesis project focused on the impact of digital transformation on customer service models.
Completed foundational coursework in economics, accounting, and business law.
Received ECTS credits to continue towards further education.
Explored the principles of human behaviour and cognitive processes.
Completed courses in areas such as developmental psychology and research methods.
Achieved Irish Baccalaureate qualification, providing a strong foundation for higher education.
